###################################
Django-rblog official documentation
###################################

Welcome to Django-rblog official documentation.

Django-rblog is another simple blog application written in Django. It started
being a game to learn Django but improvements arrives day by day and now it's
a stable blog plattform. Do you want to give it a try?
